text: Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 65. I will not teach Dhamma to a person who sits clasping his knees and who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๖๕ . พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้นั่งรัดเข่า”
65. I shall not teach Dhamma to one who sits grasping the knees who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
